input_email_body:
Subject: Problem Description

To the support team, here is a brief description of the issue: What happened: Medical data transfer failed using the Anker USB C cable. Why it might have happened: The cable is possibly incompatible with the Linux system You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. What has been tried: Restarted Jenkins, reviewed Terraform configurations. Assistance is greatly appreciated in this matter. My name is Sophia Rossi.
